import mlflow
import pickle

# Set MLflow tracking URI
mlflow.set_tracking_uri("https://dagshub.com/Pankaj220/yt-comment-sentiment-analysis.mlflow")

# Method 1: Load from artifact path
model_uri = "runs:/033eebf27edd4c5686986fd1c046761e/model/lgbm_model.pkl"
model = mlflow.sklearn.load_model(model_uri)

# Method 2: Load directly from run

model_path = f"runs:/{run_id}/model"
